long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
World's first Machine Learning & Neuroscience-based Chrome Extension that helps you improve learning productivity and reduce cognitive fatigue.

- Chrome extension captures your eye movement data while you read on your PC or Mac
- Data is processed by a patented AI & ML powered analytics system
- Generates Detailed and Actionable feedback of your reading session

YOUR PRIVACY IS FULLY PROTECTED
Our technology works with only face & eye landmarks to recognize eye-movement activity and does not collect any video or audio data.
The extension works only with a web camera and does not intervene in web content. You will never have to worry about your privacy.
